attributes.action: That no person should be able to claim asylum from any from country where British forces are currently engaged in combat operations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be no right of asylum from any country where British forces are engaged in combat operations. Our troops are being killed and wounded to protect and enforce a regional democratic way of the indiginous population. All claimants who are granted refugee status make a total mockery of the UN refugee covention.
